title: Simple Calculator UI
short_description: A glassmorphism-based calculator app with clean design and smooth user interaction.
full_description: A visually appealing calculator built with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript featuring glassmorphism design. It offers basic arithmetic operations with an intuitive UI suitable for beginners and non-tech users.
admin_words: Focused on design and user experience, this project reflects my experiments with CSS effects and aesthetic UI components.

title: Custom SMS API Solution
short_description: An API-integrated SMS platform used with services like Badhan and Robi Express.
full_description: Developed a platform to send SMS via APIs from multiple service providers. Though discontinued for ethical reasons, it was a deep dive into API integration and security practices.
admin_words: Built as a real-world tool, it helped me understand authentication layers and rate limits with public APIs.

title: IPTV Streamer App
short_description: Stream IPTV content with M3U playlist support and multiple video engines.
full_description: Supports JSON and M3U playlists with 4 different media playback methods. Designed to explore IPTV systems. Discontinued due to copyright concerns.
admin_words: Built to understand media streaming logic and playlist parsing with multiple players.

title: Urban AI – ChatGPT Integration
short_description: A lightweight ChatGPT interface with custom styling for easy conversations.
full_description: A minimal HTML/JS-based ChatGPT integration offering conversational AI interaction in a user-friendly format. Great for experimenting with OpenAI APIs.
admin_words: My first step into merging frontend skills with powerful language models like ChatGPT.

title: Temporary Email System
short_description: Create disposable email inboxes with APIs like 1secmail and mail.tm.
full_description: A two-version build: v1 with basic inbox using 1secmail, and v2 upgraded to support mail.tm with login functionality and persistent inbox. Great for spam-free testing.
admin_words: Solved a real problem during test signups. Also explored API upgrades and version control.

title: HTML Encryption Tool
short_description: Offline tool to encrypt and obfuscate HTML code.
full_description: Encrypts HTML content for basic source code protection, aimed at creators who want to obscure their content. Works entirely offline.
admin_words: Helps non-tech people protect their work. Shows how simple encryption works with JS.

title: JSON to M3U Converter
short_description: A conversion tool to generate M3U playlists from JSON IPTV data.
full_description: Takes structured JSON channel data and turns it into valid M3U format playlists. Useful for IPTV devs or testers working on stream-based platforms.
admin_words: Part of my IPTV project journey. Taught me data structuring and format parsing.

title: Password Generator (C++ UI)
short_description: Secure password generator with GUI features and custom word options.
full_description: Initially a CLI project, now upgraded to GUI using C++. Users can generate secure passwords with different rules and even include their custom words.
admin_words: One of my proudest CLI-to-GUI conversions—blending logic with interface design.
technologies: GUI Toolkit (e.g., Qt or Windows Forms)

title: SIM Toolkit Utilities (SimTools)
short_description: A toolkit for SIM-based services like balance check, recharge automation, etc.
full_description: Built for academic and telecom exploration, SimTools contains mini utilities to automate or simplify SIM card-related tasks (offline app).
admin_words: Built during my network basics exploration. Learned mobile integration concepts.

title: Interactive Weather App
short_description: A weather app using location or city to fetch real-time data via API.
full_description: Simple web app that uses the OpenWeather API to fetch weather updates based on user input or geolocation. Built with intuitive UI in mind.
admin_words: A hands-on way to learn API integration, input handling, and responsive layout.
